Body:
data = np.array([[9.7, 47.6, 1.22], [43.8, 24.6, 2.822]])
z, ss = core._krige(np.vstack((data[:, (0)], data[:, (1)])).T, data[:, (2)],
    np.array([18.8, 67.9]), variogram_models.linear_variogram_model, [0.006,
    0.1], 'euclidean')
assert z == approx(1.6364, rel=0.0001)
assert ss == approx(0.4201, rel=0.0001)
z, ss = core._krige(np.vstack((data[:, (0)], data[:, (1)])).T, data[:, (2)],
    np.array([43.8, 24.6]), variogram_models.linear_variogram_model, [0.006,
    0.1], 'euclidean')
assert z == approx(2.822, rel=0.001)
assert ss == approx(0.0, rel=0.001)
